mapper.sql: SELECT t.items_id, t.title, t.introduction, t.start_time, t.end_time, t.url, t.cost, t.state, t.invoice, t.reimbursement, t.specification, t.url, GROUP_CONCAT(m.user_id) userId , GROUP_CONCAT(m.state) user_state FROM t_items t LEFT JOIN t_members m ON (t.items_id=m.task_id) where 1=1
mapper.select: select copyright_id,item_id from t_copyright where item_id = #{itemId}
